hero.headline: Network
hero.description: Real-time view of TrueLeap's global network. Every dot represents an active edge node serving a community.

networkArchitecture.title: Edge Processing
networkArchitecture.description: Data processed locally at each node. Only aggregated, anonymized metrics are transmitted for network health monitoring.

networkArchitecture.title: Mesh Networking
networkArchitecture.description: Nodes form self-healing mesh networks that automatically route around failures and optimize for latency.

networkArchitecture.title: Solar Powered
networkArchitecture.description: All nodes are solar-powered with 72hr battery backup. Average power draw is under 2W per node.

cta.headline: Want to see the network in action?
cta.description: Schedule a live demo to see real-time data from our deployed nodes, or explore our technical documentation.
